How Skill Match Works

Your simple guide to finding reliable home service professionals and offering your expert skills.

For Clients

1. Post Your Job

Describe your project needs, budget, and timeline for electricians, plumbers, or any home service.

Post a Job

2. Review Proposals

Compare quotes, profiles, and reviews from qualified service providers who are interested in your job.

Browse Professionals

3. Hire & Pay Securely

Select your chosen professional and manage payments securely through our escrow system.

Learn About Payments

For Service Providers

1. Create Your Profile

Showcase your skills, experience, and portfolio to attract clients looking for your expertise.

Sign Up as Provider

2. Submit Proposals

Apply to relevant jobs posted by clients with competitive quotes and clear timelines.

Find Jobs

3. Get Paid Securely

Complete your work to a high standard and receive secure payments promptly through our platform.

Payment Info

Our Verification Process

Identity Verification
We verify the identity of all service providers through secure ID checks to build a trustworthy community.
License & Certification
We confirm that professional licenses and certifications are valid and current where applicable.
Client Reviews & Ratings
Our transparent review and rating system helps you choose professionals based on their past performance and client feedback.
Background Checks
Optional background checks are available for certain services, offering an additional layer of peace of mind.

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I know the service provider is qualified?

All providers undergo a verification process which includes checking credentials where applicable. You can also review their profiles, portfolios, client ratings, and past reviews to assess their qualifications and experience.

What if I'm not satisfied with the work?

We encourage clear communication with your service provider throughout the project. If issues arise, Skill Match offers a dispute resolution process to help mediate. Additionally, payments through our escrow system are only released upon your approval of the completed work.

How does payment work?

Payments are handled securely through our platform. When you hire a professional, the agreed amount is held in an escrow account. Funds are released to the service provider only after you confirm that the work has been completed to your satisfaction.

Ready to Get Started?

Whether you're looking for top-tier talent or seeking new opportunities, Skill Match connects you with the right people.
